extension.name: S3Framework
extension.author: Team DC - Shaz3e
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE file.
extension.description:
S3 Responsive Template System

Get more help and find out more at http://www.Sha3e.com

Key Features

  • Responsive Design supporting Phone, Tablets and Desktops
  • LESS CSS auto-compilation
  • Flexible widgets for template customization
  • Full extensible framework architecture

S3 Framework Base Theme

The S3 Framework base theme is a clean modern responsive design that is a great place to start when building your custom S3 powered theme.

What is the S3 Responsive Framework?

S3 is a sophisticated framework with the sole intention of being the best platform to build a solid theme with. S3 takes all the lessons learned during the development of many Joomla templates Themes and distills that knowledge into a single super-flexible framework that is easy to configure, simple to extend, and powerful enough to handle anything we want to throw at it.

field.name: sitetitle
field.label: Site Name
field.description: Type your sitename here, if its blank the default will be use. This title will also be used in footer copyright.

field.name: color_theme
field.label: Choose Color Theme
field.description: You can choose your default color theme here

field.name: style
field.label: Choose Style
field.description: You can choose your default style here

field.name: analytics
field.label: Analytic Code
field.description: Copy and Paste your javascript code

field.name: developmentMode
field.label: Development Mode?
field.description: Enable or Disable development mode for this website.

field.name: fluidContainer
field.label: Fluid Layout
field.description: Use Fluid or Static layout (both are responsive)

field.name: documentGenerator
field.label: Type Meta Generator
field.description: Type your custom meta generator text here.

field.name: showFrontPage
field.label: Show Component
field.description: Show or Hide component on Main Page if Yes Selected please enable Show main Body

field.name: showMainBody
field.label: Show Main Body
field.description: Show or Hide main body container on main page

field.name: hideComponent
field.label: Hide Component
field.description: Hide Component (Body Container) on certain pages which are selected

field.name: gfont_config
field.label: Use Google Font?
field.description: Enable/Disable Google Web Fonts

field.name: gfont_body
field.label: Choose Body Font
field.description: You can choose your default font here. i.e. Open Sans Condensed

field.name: gfont_body_styles
field.label: Body Font Weight
field.description: Choose the styles you want. i.e. 300,400,700

field.name: gfont_heading
field.label: Choose Heading Font
field.description: You can choose your default headings font here for h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6 tags. i.e. Oswald

field.name: gfont_heading_styles
field.label: Heading Font Weight
field.description: Choose the styles you want. i.e. 300,400,700

field.name: logo
field.label: Logo Image
field.description: You can use any image format as your logo

field.name: header_style
field.label: Change Header Style
field.description: Select the header you would like to use through out the website.

field.name: s3_social_icon
field.label: Social Icons
field.description: Please enable or disable social icons in header by default its disabled, Remember to use Font Awesome library.

field.name: s3_phone_box
field.label: Type your Phone No
field.description: Please type phone number here

field.name: s3_email_box
field.label: Type your email
field.description: Please type your email address here

field.name: s3_calltoaction
field.label: Text for Call to Action
field.description: Please write for call to action option

field.name: s3_search_box
field.label: Enable Search Box
field.description: Please enable or disable search box in header by default its enable

field.name: s3_search_type
field.label: Select Search Type
field.description: Select the type of search box to appear on your website

field.name: fixedHeader
field.label: Fixed Header and Menu?
field.description: If you want to hide/show header and Menu on scroll up/down

field.name: headerTextColor
field.label: Text Color
field.description: Header Text Color i.e. #000000

field.name: headerBackgroundColor
field.label: Background Color
field.description: Header Background Color i.e. #ffffff

field.name: fixedHeaderSize
field.label: Header Height
field.description: Change body top padding when using fixed header i.e. 200

field.name: fixedHeaderSpeed
field.label: Ease Speed
field.description: Define header ease slideUp/slideDown speed in ms default 0

field.name: breakPoint
field.label: Break Point
field.description: Type your break point (only number) i.e. (768 for tablet) fixed header will show on larger than break point defined here.

field.name: s3_ccstyle
field.label: Change Style
field.description: Select the Copyright and Credit styles to use through out the website.

field.name: copyright
field.label: Show Copyright
field.description: You can Show or Hide copyright information here.

field.name: copyright_text
field.label: Copyright Text
field.description: Type your own copyright text i.e. All copyright reserved by Shaz3e

field.name: credit
field.label: Show Credit
field.description: You can Show or Hide credit information here.

field.name: credit_text
field.label: Credit Text
field.description: Type your own credit text i.e. Designed by Shaz3e

field.name: shaz3e
field.label: Show Framework Logo
field.description: You can Show or Hide Framework Logo here.

field.name: footer_logo
field.label: Custom Footer Logo
field.description: You can use any image format as your logo for footer

field.name: footer_custom_title
field.label: Custom Title
field.description: Type custom title for footer logo

field.name: footer_custom_link
field.label: Custom Link
field.description: Type custom link for footer logo

field.name: footer_link_target
field.label: Link Target
field.description: Select Link Target Type on Footer Logo

field.name: s3cc_fixed
field.label: Fixed CC Area?
field.description: Enable or Disable Sticky Copyright and Credit. This will only work on larget than 980px devices.

field.name: s3cc_fixed_trigger
field.label: Fixed Trigger
field.description: just adjust this to whatever pixel from the bottom you want to trigger on.

field.name: s3cc_text_color
field.label: Text Color
field.description: CC Text Color i.e. #000000

field.name: s3cc_background_color
field.label: Background Color
field.description: CC Background Color i.e. #000000

field.name: s3cc_link_color
field.label: Link Color
field.description: CC Link Color i.e. #000000

field.name: s3cc_link_hover_color
field.label: Link Hover Color
field.description: CC Link Hover Color i.e. #000000

field.name: logoGridClass
field.label: Set Logo Column
field.description: Select the number of columns for logo i.e. if 3 is selected for logo columns header modules next to logo will be automatically adjusted to 9

field.name: sidebarGridClass
field.label: Set Sidebar Column
field.description: Select the number of columns for left/right sidebars component area will be automatically adjusted with 2 columns or 3 columns layouts

field.name: topModuleCount
field.label: Set Top Column
field.description: How many columns should be in one row. i.e. if you select 3 Columns and you have enabled 4 modules in one row the 4th module will be in next row

field.name: slideshowModuleCount
field.label: Set Slideshow Column
field.description: How many columns should be in one row. i.e. if you select 3 Columns and you have enabled 4 modules in one row the 4th module will be in next row

field.name: showcaseModuleCount
field.label: Set Showcase Column
field.description: How many columns should be in one row. i.e. if you select 3 Columns and you have enabled 4 modules in one row the 4th module will be in next row

field.name: featureModuleCount
field.label: Set Feature Column
field.description: How many columns should be in one row. i.e. if you select 3 Columns and you have enabled 4 modules in one row the 4th module will be in next row

field.name: bottomFeatureModuleCount
field.label: Set Bottom Feature Column
field.description: How many columns should be in one row. i.e. if you select 3 Columns and you have enabled 4 modules in one row the 4th module will be in next row

field.name: utilityModuleCount
field.label: Set Utility Column
field.description: How many columns should be in one row. i.e. if you select 3 Columns and you have enabled 4 modules in one row the 4th module will be in next row

field.name: scrollerModuleCount
field.label: Set Scroller Column
field.description: How many columns should be in one row. i.e. if you select 3 Columns and you have enabled 4 modules in one row the 4th module will be in next row

field.name: extensionModuleCount
field.label: Set Extension Column
field.description: How many columns should be in one row. i.e. if you select 3 Columns and you have enabled 4 modules in one row the 4th module will be in next row

field.name: bottomModuleCount
field.label: Set Bottom Column
field.description: How many columns should be in one row. i.e. if you select 3 Columns and you have enabled 4 modules in one row the 4th module will be in next row

field.name: footerModuleCount
field.label: Set Footer Column
field.description: How many columns should be in one row. i.e. if you select 3 Columns and you have enabled 4 modules in one row the 4th module will be in next row

field.name: bottomFooterModuleCount
field.label: Set Bottom Footer Column
field.description: How many columns should be in one row. i.e. if you select 3 Columns and you have enabled 4 modules in one row the 4th module will be in next row

field.name: LocalCDN
field.label: Hosted on CDN
field.description: By disabling this feature template will use all libraries files locally.

field.name: loadjQuery
field.label: Use jQuery addScript
field.description: If you want to load jQuery as addScript select yes otherwise select no to load jquery before everything. Caution: If you are using addScript fixed header on scroll up/down won't work.

field.name: loadBootstrap
field.label: Use Bootstrap
field.description: Enable or Disable Bootstrap

field.name: loadBootstrapTheme
field.label: Use Bootstrap Theme
field.description: Enable or Disable Bootstrap Theme

field.name: loadFontAwesome
field.label: Use Font Awesome
field.description: Enable or Disable Font Awesome for Icons
